word_mean: 萘：银白色结晶碳氢化合物，C10H8，得自煤焦油。不溶于冷水，但溶于热水、酒精、醚、氯仿及苯。过去用于伤寒腹泻，作为抗感染药

sentence.Network_en: It'seems that refination of naphthalene through low - naphthalene washing oil is more economic.
sentence.Network_cn: 笔者认为利用低萘洗油进行萘的深度净化最为经济有效.

sentence.Network_en: In fact, camphor and naphthalene balls are different in nature.
sentence.Network_cn: 事实上, 樟脑和臭丸在性质上是不同的.

sentence.Network_en: So here I would like to talk about camphor and naphthalene ball.
sentence.Network_cn: 所以在这里,我想谈论一下樟脑和臭丸.
